content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal feelings or opinions, but as for the most impactful moment for viewers, it may differ from person to person as it depends on their personal experiences and perspectives. Some scenes that fans have found powerful and resonant in different ways include the opening scene of the film where Judah Ben-Hur reunites with his childhood friend Messala, the epic chariot race sequence, and the emotional and dramatic ending of the film where Judah forgives his enemies and finds redemption.
